title: Ticket #1509: DAGMan problems when filesystem fills up
description:
See the "problem with failure associated with LOG LINE CACHE" thread on condor-users, about Jun 4 2010 or so.

Apparently this problem has something to do with a filesystem filling up, but I'm not sure if it's the filesystem with the node job user log files, or the Condor daemon logs.

We should at least try to fail in a better way...
